title:
Blow-up solutions to a class of nonlinear coupled Schr\"odinger systems
  with power-type-growth nonlinearities
abstract:
In this work we consider a system of nonlinear Schr\"odinger equations whose
nonlinearities satisfy a power-type-growth. First, we prove that the Cauchy
problem is local and global well-posedness in $L^2$ and $H^1$. Next, we
establish the existence of ground state solutions. Then we use these solutions
to study the dichotomy of global existence versus blow-up in finite time.
Similar results were presented in the reference Noguera N. and Pastor A. 2022
https://doi.org/10.1142/S0219199720500236 for the special case when the growth
of the nonlinearities was quadratic. Here we will extend them to systems with
nolinearities of order $p$ (cubic, quartic and so on). Finally, we recover some
known results for two particular systems, one with quadratic and the other with
cubic growth nolinearities.
